programme.desc: Coverage of day eight at the All England Club, where the ladies' quarter-final singles matches are due to take place. All four of the last-eight matches at last year's tournament were settled in straight sets, and it was the unseeded Elena Vesnina who claimed the win of the round as she eliminated 18th seed Dominika Cibulkova. programme.desc: Coverage of day nine at the All England Club, where the mens' quarter-final singles matches are due to take place. Both Roger Federer and Andy Murray were involved in epic five-set encounters at this stage of last year's competition, with the Swiss being pushed all the way by Marin Cilic before eventually prevailing 6-7, 4-6, 6-3, 7-6, 6-3, while Murray registered a 7-6, 6-1, 3-6, 4-6, 6-1 win over Jo-Wilfried Tsonga. Meanwhile, there were also victories for Milos Raonic and Tomas Berdych over Sam Querrey and Lucas Pouille respectively.(n)
